Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
11.11.2013 SH SCR18443 Changed test "Drawings exceed LC amount incl. tolerance" from Error to Warning message, same also for
test "Drawings and pending releases exceed LC amount incl. tolerance"
05.03.2013 JH SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
04.04.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
06.05.2011 SH SCR16446 Replaced table CURR by CURA
04.02.2011 SH SCR15212 Added button Connect
14.06.2010 GB SCR15540 Replacement calls the BMQ002 by the BMQ005
05.05.2009 SH SCR14613 Removed current LCHI row from selection to calc
19.08.2008 SH SCR13783 Removed test LCHI_TRANSIT_PRESOLD>LCHI_AMOUNTLC
14.08.2008 SH SCR13783 Moved additional tests (releases/drawings) to separate
task, which is peformed at the end of OAD707A now
14.05.2008 SH SCR13575 Fixed problem with test "Drawings exceed LC amount incl.
tolerance" and removed logic to set LCHI_AMOUNTRELEASEDRAWING = 0
15.04.2008 SH SCR13541 Removed test on LCHI_AMOUNTRELEASEDRAWING <> 0 to
call OAD707B in query mode only
03.09.2007 SH SCR12877 Disbaled LCHI_TRANSIT_PRESOLD / LCHI_TRANSIT for modify
27.04.2007 SH SCR12484 Added BMQ002.PI.DATE = null
24.11.2006 SH SCR12118 Extended calc of v.HIGHESTLCAMOUNT amount from
LCHI_TYPEOFCHANGE < 4 to LCHI_TYPEOFCHANGE < 10
20.11.2006 SH SCR12108 Extended test when LCHI_CARRIER_DEBH_NO is mandatory
14.11.2006 SH SCR12097 Added test on LCHI_DATEFIRSTOK = null to enable modify
20.10.2006 SH SCR11403 Changed logic to select releases via OAD707B
18.10.2006 SH SCR11403 Changes acc. to "LC remarks 20" --> Added header lines
18.10.2006 SH SCR11947 Added PI.MODE to F5 list for carrier
13.10.2006 SH SCR11403 Changed handling of related releases
11.10.2006 SH SCR11403 Changed selection of CURR to fetch CURR_EXCHGRATEDAILY
11.10.2006 SH SCR11983 Fixed bug acc. to calcl of DTLR_NO with GB003 and
changed calc of V.SUMDRAWINGSANDRELEASES
-- global fields
-- working fields
-- Shortcut labels
... do not open screen for create, if user has only Query permission
-- Shortcut handling
... load/reload LCHD/CLHI database fields
-- Button Archive
-- Button New letter
-- Button Related release
-- Update LCHI_AMOUNTRELEASEDRAWING if releases are changed/selected in
OAD707B
-- Button Connect
-- Update LCHI_AMOUNTRELEASEDRAWING if releases are changed/selected in
OAD707B
.... final validations have to be performed also here because button Connect is
enabled, incl OAD707B changes also if OAD707A is only opened in query mode
-- Button OK: Save LCHI after changes
.. if one of the detail buttons is activated then one of these subprograms has
to be called if the database updates are performed
-- Final validations, if users leaves the program
... in case of errors, the OAD707A is re-loaded
-- Check and store changes
-- An error occured, return to screen
-- else go on to store changes to database
-- change to modify mode
-- Check for changes, made by user
-- If user changed something on screen, ask to save changes

Text.valUnicode: Original Bill of Loading + English invoice

ExpSyntax.val: VarMod ('{0,2}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,3}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,4}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,9}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,10}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,11}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,12}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,13}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,14}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,15}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,22}'VAR)

Text.val: ... v.LCHI_AMOUNTLC must be entered
... v.LCHI_CARRIER_DEBH_NO must be > 0 if LCHI_FORWARDDOCUMENTS = TRUE or ....
... v.LCHI_CARRIER_DEBH_NO must exists in DEBH if entered
-- Users have to confirm the exchange rate
-- If no errors occured updates variables uses to store LCHD
-- In case of exchage rate is not accepted
-- Entered exchange rate more then 10 % different from daily rate. Is this OK ?
... else error, reactivate the online screen
-- OAD707A is called for query / modify
-- Creation of new LCHI row
-- Settings for button Connect
-- get highest sequnece number
... only if a new LCHI row has to be stored
... write MQ 153 to ask approval from client manager
... send letter to bank in case of differences
... adjust drawings
... adjust releases
... write MQ 153 to ask approval from client manager
... adjust drawings
... adjust releases

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(LCRD_AMOUNT) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/LCRD where LCRD_LCHD_NO = :2 and LCRD_LCHI_NO_DRAWING = :3 for fetch only
select cast(sum(LCRD_AMOUNT) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/LCRD where LCRD_LCHD_NO = :2 and LCRD_LCHI_NO_RELEASE = :3 for fetch only

Text.val: -- Final test Releases / Drawings
-- 1. Drawings exceed LC amount incl. tolerance
(only info)
-- 3. Check if outstanding goods releases without related document drawing exist
(only info)
-- 4. Drawings and pending releases exceed LC amount incl. tolerance
(only info)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(LCHI_AMOUNTLC) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/LCHI where LCHI_LCHD_NO = :2 and LCHI_TYPEOFCHANGE < 10 for fetch only

select cast(sum(LCHI_AMOUNTLC) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/LCHI where LCHI_LCHD_NO = :2 and LCHI_TYPEOFCHANGE = 10 and LCHI_DATEOK is null and not(LCHI_DRAWINGDIFFERENCE = 'Y' and LCHI_DRAWINGDIFFERENCEOK = 'N') for fetch only

select cast(sum(LCHI_AMOUNTLC - LCHI_AMOUNTRELEASEDRAWING) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/LCHI where LCHI_LCHD_NO = :2 and LCHI_NO <> :3 and ((LCHI_TYPEOFCHANGE = 10 and LCHI_DATEOK is null and not(LCHI_DRAWINGDIFFERENCE = 'Y' and LCHI_DRAWINGDIFFERENCEOK = 'N')) or LCHI_TYPEOFCHANGE = 20) for fetch only
